text: Singa twayagala twandimusitudde e ddaala olw'obubonero obwo, naye mazima ddala yye yeemalira ku nsi, era nâ€™agoberera okwagalakwe, olwo nno e kifaananyi kye alinga e mbwa bwogigoba e misinde ewejjawejja, ate nebwogireka eba ewejjawejja, ekyo nno kye kifaananyi kyabo abaalimbisa e bigambo byaffe, bategeeze ebyafaayo kibayambe ku bigambo byaffe, bategeeze ebyafaayo, kibayambe okwefumiitiriza
